Title: Aria
Director: Robert Altman, Bruce Beresford, Bill Bryden, Jean-Luc Godard, Derek Jarman, Franc Roddam, Nicolas Roeg, Ken Russell, Charles Sturridge, Julien Temple
Writer: Robert Altman (segment), Bruce Beresford (segment), Don Boyd (segment), Bill Bryden (segment), Derek Jarman (segment), Franc Roddam (segment), Nicolas Roeg (segment), Ken Russell (segment), Charles Sturridge (segment), Julien Temple (segment)
Actors: Theresa Russell, Stephanie Lane, Roy Hyatt, Sevilla Delofski
Plot: Ten short pieces directed by ten different directors, including Ken Russell, Jean-Luc Godard, Robert Altman, Bruce Beresford, and Nicolas Roeg. Each short uses an aria as soundtrack/sound (Vivaldi, Bach, Wagner), and is an interpretation of the particular aria.
